select DATE_FORMAT(o.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(o.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') completeTime, o.id,o.orderNo,o.tradeType,o.money,o.mobile,o.status,o.statusCode,o.note,o.responseCode,o.responseMessage,o.merchantId,o.sourceId, u.USER_REAL_NAME realName
from yuyue_order o,yuyue_merchant u WHERE 1=1 and o.merchantId = u.ID
and o.orderNo = #{orderNo} and CONCAT(o.tradeType) like concat('%', #{tradeType}, '%')
and o.tradeType in ('CZWX','XF','CZIOS','SMWX','SMZFB','CZZFB')
and o.tradeType in ('GGWX','GGZFB')
and o.tradeType in ('GGWX','GGZFB','CZWX','XF','CZIOS','SMWX','SMZFB','CZZFB')
and CONCAT(u.USER_REAL_NAME) like concat('%', #{realName}, '%') and CONCAT(o.mobile) like concat('%', #{mobile}, '%') and o.status = #{status}
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY o.CREATE_TIME DESC
